incorrect_login_or_password: The username or password is incorrect.
not_auth_or_token_expired: You are not logged in, or the lifetime of the session token has come to an end.
error_creating_user_details: The user was not created in the database in the table UserDetails.
error_creating_user: The user was not created in the database in the table Users.
session_id_not_exists: There is no unique session identifier.
user_with_email_already_exists: A user with a postal address {{email}} already exists.
user_with_phone_already_exists: The user with the phone number {{phone}} already exists.
session_id_not_exists_on_deleted_session: The user's session ID is missing (session={{session}}).
sharp_avatar_path_not_found: The path to the compressed avatar file was not transmitted.
sharp_photo_path_not_found: The path to the compressed photo file was not transmitted.
delete_photo_path_not_found: The path for deleting the photo was not passed.
file_path_open_not_found: The path for opening the file was not passed.
file_path_download_not_found: The file download path was not passed.
sharped_photo_with_error: An error occurred when cropping images.
not_correct_answer_get_friends_notificat: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (getFriendsNotification).
not_correct_answer_possible_users: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (possibleUsers).
not_correct_answer_get_friends_tab_0: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (tab=0).
not_correct_answer_get_friends_tab_1: The list of users on the server is empty (tab=1).
not_correct_answer_get_friends_tab_2: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (tab=2).
not_correct_answer_get_friends_tab_3: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (tab=3).
not_correct_answer_get_friends_tab_4: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (tab=4).
not_correct_answer_get_friends_tab_5: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything. (tab=5).
unknown_tab: The tab type is not recognized.
not_temporal_chat_id: The caller ID was not found, it is possible that this is a temporary chat.
subscribed_id_not_found: The ID of the user being added was not transmitted.
unsubscribed_id_not_found: The ID of the described user was not transmitted.
add_to_friend_id_not_found: The ID of the accepted user was not transmitted.
left_to_subscribed_id_not_found: The ID of the subscribed user was not transmitted.
deleted_id_not_found: The ID of the user being deleted was not transmitted.
blocked_id_not_found: The ID of the blocked user was not transmitted.
check_blocked_id_not_found: The ID of the verified user was not transmitted.
user_not_found_in_database: The user's entry in the database was not found.
user_id_not_found: The user's ID was not transmitted.
user_with_id_not_found: The user with id={{id}} was not found.
not_correct_answer_get_dialogs: The request was executed incorrectly and did not return anything (getDialogs/unReadMessagesCount).
chat_id_not_found: The unique chat ID was not transmitted.
user_id_in_message_not_found: Your unique identifier was not transmitted in the message object.
chat_id_in_message_not_found: The unique chat ID was not passed in the message object.
message_id_not_found: The unique identifier of the message was not transmitted.
message_can_not_be_empty_without_files: Error when changing the message, it cannot be empty without attached files.
chat_partner_id_not_found: The unique identifier of the interlocutor was not transmitted.
chat_partner_not_found: The chat interlocutor was not found.
deleted_message_id_not_found: The unique identifier of the message being deleted was not transmitted.
your_already_delete_this_message: This message has already been deleted by you.
deleted_chat_id_not_found: The unique identifier of the private chat being deleted was not transmitted.
users_in_chat_not_found: No users were found in the {{chat}} chat.
chat_with_chat_id_not_found: The chat with the ID {{chat}} was not found.
photo_not_given: The image was not found in the request object.
photos_not_found: Images were not transmitted for compression.
user_id_not_given: The user ID was not transmitted.
incorrect_type_in_friends: Incorrect type when acting as a friend.
cannot_find_call: It is impossible to end the call because it has not been found. It may have already been completed.
not_correct_user_id_in_socket: The user ID={{userTo}} is not suitable (you must use the notify Me method).
socket_disconnected_with_reason: The socket with the connection ID {{socketId}} was disconnected due to: {{reason}}.
error_in_update_last_seen: An error occurred when updating the time of the user's last login.
error_on_socket_work: An error occurred while working with the socket.
error_engine_socket:
Abnormal disconnection of the socket with the {{code}}.
Request object: {{req}}.
Error text: {{message}}.
Additional context: {{context}}.
database_start: The connection to the database has been successfully established.
database_close: The database connection has been successfully closed.
error_in_connect_db: The connection to the database failed with an error.
error_in_client_connect: Connection to the Redis database failed:
redis_connection_successfull: The connection to the Redis client has been successfully established.
redis_start_to_work: The Redis client is ready to work.
redis_stopped: The Redis client has been stopped.
error_get_redis_value: An error occurred when getting the key value [{{key}}] by Redis.
new_pair_is_set_to_redis: New pair [{{key}}:{{value}}] successfully written to Redis.
error_when_setting_new_pair_to_redis: An error occurred when writing a new pair [{{key}}:{{value}}] to Redis.
key_successfull_deleted_from_redis: The key [{{key}}] has been successfully deleted from Redis.
error_when_deleted_key_from_redis: An error occurred when deleting the [{{key}}] key from Redis.
server_started_with_port_and_mode: The server instance is running on port: {{port}} in mode: {{mode}}.
start_server_error: An error occurred when starting the server instance
unhandled_sync_error: An unhandled error in synchronous code
unhandled_async_error: An unhandled error in asynchronous code
error_when_initialize_i18n: An error occurred while initializing the i18n package.
